alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 1:04PM EST until January 27 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 PM EST Thursday the stage was 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to hover around minor flood state of 11.0 feet until this evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.0 feet on 01/13/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Thu 12 pm: 11.0 Forecast: Thu 1 pm 11.0 Thu 7 pm 11.0 Fri 1 am 10.8 Fri 7 am 9.5 &&
